post.description: Create a Stripe checkout session for subscription
Authenticate user using Google Subject ID and return a JWT token

get.description: Retrieve a list of all subscriptions
Retrieve details of a specific subscription

delete.description: Remove a subscription from the system

patch.description: Update details of an existing subscription

get.description: Retrieve a list of all teams

post.description: Create a new team for the authenticated user and add them as owner

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific team

delete.description: Remove a team from the system

patch.description: Update details of an existing team

post.description: Create a join request for a specific team

get.description: Retrieve a list of all join requests for a specific team
Retrieve details of a specific join request

delete.description: Cancel or delete a join request

patch.description: Approve a user's request to join a team
Deny a user's request to join a team

get.description: Retrieve a list of all members in a specific team
Retrieve a list of all registered users

post.description: Register a new user in the system

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific user by their ID

delete.description: Remove a user from the system

patch.description: Update details of an existing user

get.description: Retrieve a list of all notifications for a specific user
Retrieve details of a specific notification

delete.description: Remove a notification from the system

get.description: Retrieve the team information for a specific user

post.description: Receive and process Stripe webhook events (e.g. checkout completed, subscription updated)
